CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Leave Product Review stage positioned above or below the Initiate Checkout stage?
SRP.A: The Leave Product Review stage is positioned {below} the Initiate Checkout stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Leave Product Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Leave Product Review is {2185}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {6104}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Add to Cart, with a value of {19234}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {2185}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initiate Checkout to stage Enter Payment Information?
SC.A: Decreased by {4846} Users from stage Initiate Checkout to stage Enter Payment Information.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {3438} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 8527? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Cart} stage has {19234}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {10950}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 8527? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Enter Payment Information} stage has {6104}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {2666}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {2185}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2425 and 15092? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {10950}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {6104}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {2666}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to {Initiate Checkout} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to {Enter Payment Information} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review, from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to stage {Initiate Checkout} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Add to Cart} and {Initiate Checkout} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Purchase} and {Leave Product Review} stages.
